short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the current article to @Voice Aloud Reader Android app reading list through Dropbox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Companion desktop Chrome extension for @Voice Aloud Reader app for Android. When you see any interesting page in your desktop Chrome browser, simply click the @Voice extension icon and it will be added to @Voice reading list. Later read or listen to a list of saved articles as you commute, jog, walk, do household chores etc.

The articles are synced through your Dropbox storage "/Apps/@Voice" folder. Synced articles which you remove in @Voice app from your reading list, are automatically deleted in Dropbox.

See also @Voice Aloud Reader listing in Google Play Android app store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hyperionics.avar

Version 2.2
* Now works through your Dropbox account. Create a free account at dropbox.com if necessary.
* Update 2.2 fixes a problem with incorrectly saving some text files after selecting text - right-click - choosing "Add to @Voice reading list".
